statements.statement: select * from TM_PHONGBAN_KHODUOC where PHONGBAN_ID = '$PHONGBAN_ID$' and BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$' and ROWNUM = 1
select B.* from TM_PHONGBAN_KHODUOC A inner join TM_KHODUOC B on B.KHODUOC_ID = A.KHODUOC_ID where A.PHONGBAN_ID = '$PHONGBAN_ID$' and A.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'
execute sp_PhieuDangKyKham ('$TIEPNHAN_ID$')
update TT_TIEPNHAN set SOTHUTU = #SOTHUTU# where TIEPNHAN_ID = '$TIEPNHAN_ID$'
update TT_DVYEUCAU set SOTHUTU = #SOTHUTU# where DVYEUCAU_ID = '$DVYEUCAU_ID$'
select * from TT_DVYEUCAU order by DVYEUCAU_ID

BEGIN update TT_DVYEUCAU set KHAMBENH_NGOAITRU_ID = #KHAMBENH_ID# , CHANDOAN = #CHANDOAN# , TRANGTHAI = #TRANGTHAI# , NGUOICAPNHAT_ID = '$NGUOICAPNHAT_ID$' , NGAYCAPNHAT = #NGAYCAPNHAT# where TIEPNHAN_ID = '$TIEPNHAN_ID$' and DVYEUCAU_ID = '$DVYEUCAU_ID$';
update TT_VIENPHi set DATHUCHIEN = '$DATHUCHIEN$' , NGUOICAPNHAT_ID = '$NGUOICAPNHAT_ID$' , NGAYCAPNHAT = #NGAYCAPNHAT# where REF_ID = '$DVYEUCAU_ID$' and REF_TABLE = 'TT_DVYEUCAU'; END;

select CHUAKETQUA."NUMBER" as CHUAKETQUA, HOANTAT."NUMBER" as HOANTAT, DANGDIEUTRI."NUMBER" as DANGTHUCHIEN, CHUAKETQUA.NOITHUCHIEN_ID, CHUAKETQUA.TENPHONGBAN from (select count(A.TRANGTHAI) as "NUMBER", A.NOITHUCHIEN_ID, B.TENPHONGBAN, A.TRANGTHAI from TT_DVYEUCAU A inner join TM_PHONGBAN B on B.PHONGBAN_ID = A.NOITHUCHIEN_ID where A.TRANGTHAI = 'CHUAKETQUA' and A.BENHVIEN_ID ='$BENHVIEN_ID$' and trunc(SYSDATE) = trunc(A.NGAYYEUCAU) and A.NOITHUCHIEN_ID in ($PHONGBAN_LIST$) group by A.NOITHUCHIEN_ID, B.TENPHONGBAN, A.TRANGTHAI) CHUAKETQUA left join (select count(A.TRANGTHAI) as "NUMBER", A.NOITHUCHIEN_ID, B.TENPHONGBAN, A.TRANGTHAI from TT_DVYEUCAU A inner join TM_PHONGBAN B on B.PHONGBAN_ID = A.NOITHUCHIEN_ID where A.TRANGTHAI = 'HOANTAT' and A.BENHVIEN_ID ='$BENHVIEN_ID$' and trunc(SYSDATE) = trunc(A.NGAYYEUCAU) and A.NOITHUCHIEN_ID in ($PHONGBAN_LIST$) group by A.NOITHUCHIEN_ID, B.TENPHONGBAN, A.TRANGTHAI) HOANTAT on HOANTAT.NOITHUCHIEN_ID = CHUAKETQUA.NOITHUCHIEN_ID left join (select count(A.TRANGTHAI) as "NUMBER", A.NOITHUCHIEN_ID, B.TENPHONGBAN, A.TRANGTHAI from TT_DVYEUCAU A inner join TM_PHONGBAN B on B.PHONGBAN_ID = A.NOITHUCHIEN_ID where A.TRANGTHAI = 'DANGTHUCHIEN' and A.BENHVIEN_ID ='$BENHVIEN_ID$' and trunc(SYSDATE) = trunc(A.NGAYYEUCAU) and A.NOITHUCHIEN_ID in ($PHONGBAN_LIST$) group by A.NOITHUCHIEN_ID, B.TENPHONGBAN, A.TRANGTHAI) DANGDIEUTRI on DANGDIEUTRI.NOITHUCHIEN_ID = CHUAKETQUA.NOITHUCHIEN_ID

select dvyc.* from TT_DVYEUCAU dvyc left join (select * from TT_VIENPHI where TIEPNHAN_ID = '$TIEPNHAN_ID$') vp on dvyc.DVYEUCAU_ID = vp.REF_ID where dvyc.TIEPNHAN_ID = '$TIEPNHAN_ID$' and REF_TABLE = 'TT_DVYEUCAU'
vp.BENHAN_ID = '$BENHAN_ID$'
vp.DATHANHTOAN = '$DATHANHTOAN$'
order by DVYEUCAU_ID desc

select * from TT_DVYEUCAU
TT_DVYEUCAU.DVYEUCAU_ID = '$DVYEUCAU_ID$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.TIEPNHAN_ID = '$TIEPNHAN_ID$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.BENHAN_ID = '$BENHAN_ID$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.KHAMBENH_ID = '$KHAMBENH_ID$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.SODICHVUYEUCAU = '$SODICHVUYEUCAU$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.SOPHIEUYEUCAU = '$SOPHIEUYEUCAU$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.BENHNHAN_ID = '$BENHNHAN_ID$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.DOITUONG_ID = '$DOITUONG_ID$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.DICHVU_ID = '$DICHVU_ID$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.BACSICHIDINH_ID = '$BACSICHIDINH_ID$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.GIOYEUCAU = '$GIOYEUCAU$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.NGAYYEUCAU = '$NGAYYEUCAU$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.THANGYEUCAU = '$THANGYEUCAU$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.NAMYEUCAU = '$NAMYEUCAU$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.NGAYGIOYEUCAU = '$NGAYGIOYEUCAU$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.THUTUYEUCAU = '$THUTUYEUCAU$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.NOIYEUCAU_ID = '$NOIYEUCAU_ID$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.NOITHUCHIEN_ID = '$NOITHUCHIEN_ID$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.TRANGTHAI_HANGDOI = '$TRANGTHAI_HANGDOI$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.NOIDUNGCHITIET = '$NOIDUNGCHITIET$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.CHANDOAN = '$CHANDOAN$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.LUUTRU_ID = '$LUUTRU_ID$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.SODICHVUDONGTIEN = '$SODICHVUDONGTIEN$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.DICHVU_KHAMBENH_ID = '$DICHVU_KHAMBENH_ID$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.DALAYMAU = '$DALAYMAU$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.SINHTHIET = '$SINHTHIET$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.CLOTEST = '$CLOTEST$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.TIEMCANQUANG = '$TIEMCANQUANG$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.TRIEUCHUNG = '$TRIEUCHUNG$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.DAITHE = '$DAITHE$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.VITHE = '$VITHE$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.BENHPHAM = '$BENHPHAM$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.DANHANBENHPHAM = '$DANHANBENHPHAM$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.NGAYNHANBENHPHAM = '$NGAYNHANBENHPHAM$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.THOIGIANNHANBENHPHAM = '$THOIGIANNHANBENHPHAM$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.NGUOINHANBENHPHAM_ID = '$NGUOINHANBENHPHAM_ID$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.MANGUOINHAPBENHPHAM = '$MANGUOINHAPBENHPHAM$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.TENNGUOINHAPBENHPHAM = '$TENNGUOINHAPBENHPHAM$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.KETQUAXNKHAC = '$KETQUAXNKHAC$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.YEUCAUBENNGOAI = '$YEUCAUBENNGOAI$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.THUCHIENBENNGOAI = '$THUCHIENBENNGOAI$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.DONVIBENNGOAI_ID = '$DONVIBENNGOAI_ID$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.BACSIBENNGOAI_ID = '$BACSIBENNGOAI_ID$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.TENBACSIBENNGOAI = '$TENBACSIBENNGOAI$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.KHOABENNGOAI_ID = '$KHOABENNGOAI_ID$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.KHOABENNGOAI = '$KHOABENNGOAI$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.NOITHUCHIENTHAYDOI_ID = '$NOITHUCHIENTHAYDOI_ID$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.LOAIKHACHHANG_ID = '$LOAIKHACHHANG_ID$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.THE_ID = '$THE_ID$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.BARCODEID = '$BARCODEID$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.HOPDONG_ID = '$HOPDONG_ID$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.HOPDONG_BENHNHAN_ID = '$HOPDONG_BENHNHAN_ID$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.HINHTHUCTHANHTOAN_ID = '$HINHTHUCTHANHTOAN_ID$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.DANGKY_ID = '$DANGKY_ID$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.DANGKY_CHITIET_ID = '$DANGKY_CHITIET_ID$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.LICHHEN_ID = '$LICHHEN_ID$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.THOIGIANLICHHEN = '$THOIGIANLICHHEN$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.BNKHONGDENBV = '$BNKHONGDENBV$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.GHICHU = '$GHICHU$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.THANHTOANTRUOC = '$THANHTOANTRUOC$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.KHAN = '$KHAN$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.DUOCPHEPTHUCHIEN = '$DUOCPHEPTHUCHIEN$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.HUYYEUCAU = '$HUYYEUCAU$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.LYDOHUY = '$LYDOHUY$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.TRANGTHAI = '$TRANGTHAI$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.KHOADULIEU = '$KHOADULIEU$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.NGAYKHOADULIEU = '$NGAYKHOADULIEU$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.THOIGIANKHOADULIEU = '$THOIGIANKHOADULIEU$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.NGUOIKHOA_ID = '$NGUOIKHOA_ID$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.MANGUOIKHOA = '$MANGUOIKHOA$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.TENNGUOIKHOA = '$TENNGUOIKHOA$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.NGAYTAO = '$NGAYTAO$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.NGUOITAO_ID = '$NGUOITAO_ID$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.NGAYCAPNHAT = '$NGAYCAPNHAT$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.NGUOICAPNHAT_ID = '$NGUOICAPNHAT_ID$'
order by DVYEUCAU_ID
select * from TT_DVYEUCAU where TT_DVYEUCAU.DVYEUCAU_ID = '$value$' order by DVYEUCAU_ID
select * from TT_DVYEUCAU where TT_DVYEUCAU.DVYEUCAU_ID = '$DVYEUCAU_ID$' order by DVYEUCAU_ID
select * from TT_DVYEUCAU where TT_DVYEUCAU.DVYEUCAU_ID = '$DVYEUCAU_ID$' order by DVYEUCAU_ID

select dvyc.* from TT_DVYEUCAU dvyc left join TT_VIENPHI vp on dvyc.DVYEUCAU_ID = vp.REF_ID and vp.REF_TABLE = 'TT_DVYEUCAU' where vp.DATHUCHIEN = 0 and dvyc.BENHAN_ID = '$BENHAN_ID$' and dvyc.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'
select T.THUTUYEUCAU from ( SELECT THUTUYEUCAU FROM TT_DVYEUCAU WHERE TIEPNHAN_ID = '$TIEPNHAN_ID$' ORDER BY THUTUYEUCAU DESC ) T where ROWNUM = 1
select DVYEUCAU_ID from TT_DVYEUCAU where TIEPNHAN_ID = '$TIEPNHAN_ID$' and NGUOITAO_ID = '$NGUOITAO_ID$' and DVYEUCAU_ID != '$DVYEUCAU_ID$' and KHAMBENH_ID = '$KHAMBENH_ID$'
statements.insert:
select TT_DVYEUCAU_S.nextval as value from dual
DECLARE vrkeyValue NUMBER := 0; vrBenhVienId varchar(10):= '$BENHVIEN_ID$'; vryearNow NUMBER:= TO_NUMBER(EXTRACT(YEAR FROM SYSDATE)); vrSoPhieuYeu varchar(20); vrSoRender varchar(20); vrMaNhomDichVu varchar(20):='$MANHOMDICHVU$'; BEGIN begin select KEYVALUE into vrkeyValue from LST_KEYDATA where KEYTYPE = 'SOPHIEUYEUCAU' and KEYYEAR = vryearNow and SEGMENT_1 = vrMaNhomDichVu and BENHVIEN_ID = vrBenhVienId and rownum = 1; EXCEPTION WHEN NO_DATA_FOUND THEN Insert into LST_KEYDATA values ('SOPHIEUYEUCAU', vryearNow, '0', '0', vrMaNhomDichVu, '0', '0', 0, vrBenhVienId); end; Update LST_KEYDATA set KEYVALUE = KEYVALUE + 1 where KEYTYPE = 'SOPHIEUYEUCAU' and KEYYEAR = vryearNow and SEGMENT_1 = vrMaNhomDichVu and BENHVIEN_ID = vrBenhVienId returning KEYVALUE into vrkeyValue; COMMIT WORK; vrSoRender := LPAD(TO_CHAR(vrkeyValue), 6, '0'); vrSoPhieuYeu := SUBSTR(vryearNow, 3) || '.' || vrMaNhomDichVu || '.' || vrSoRender;
insert into TT_DVYEUCAU ( DVYEUCAU_ID , TIEPNHAN_ID , BENHAN_ID , KHAMBENH_ID , SODICHVUYEUCAU , KHAMBENH_NGOAITRU_ID , SOPHIEUYEUCAU , BENHNHAN_ID , DOITUONG_ID , DICHVU_ID
NGUOICHIDINH_ID
, BACSICHIDINH_ID , GIOYEUCAU , NGAYYEUCAU , THANGYEUCAU , NAMYEUCAU , NGAYGIOYEUCAU , THUTUYEUCAU , NOIYEUCAU_ID , NOITHUCHIEN_ID , TRANGTHAI_HANGDOI , NOIDUNGCHITIET , CHANDOAN , LUUTRU_ID , SODICHVUDONGTIEN , DICHVU_KHAMBENH_ID , DALAYMAU , SINHTHIET , CLOTEST , TIEMCANQUANG , TRIEUCHUNG , DAITHE , VITHE , BENHPHAM , DANHANBENHPHAM , NGAYNHANBENHPHAM , THOIGIANNHANBENHPHAM , NGUOINHANBENHPHAM_ID , MANGUOINHAPBENHPHAM , TENNGUOINHAPBENHPHAM , KETQUAXNKHAC , YEUCAUBENNGOAI , THUCHIENBENNGOAI , DONVIBENNGOAI_ID , BACSIBENNGOAI_ID , TENBACSIBENNGOAI , KHOABENNGOAI_ID , KHOABENNGOAI
NGUOIGIOITHIEU_ID
DONVIGIOITHIEU_ID
NGUONDICHVU_ID
, NOITHUCHIENTHAYDOI_ID , LOAIKHACHHANG_ID , THE_ID , BARCODEID , HOPDONG_ID , HOPDONG_BENHNHAN_ID , HINHTHUCTHANHTOAN_ID , DANGKY_ID , DANGKY_CHITIET_ID , LICHHEN_ID , THOIGIANLICHHEN , BNKHONGDENBV , GHICHU , THANHTOANTRUOC , KHAN , DUOCPHEPTHUCHIEN , HUYYEUCAU , LYDOHUY , TRANGTHAI , KHOADULIEU , NGAYKHOADULIEU , THOIGIANKHOADULIEU , NGUOIKHOA_ID , MANGUOIKHOA , TENNGUOIKHOA , BENHVIEN_ID , NGAYTAO , NGUOITAO_ID , NGAYHENCLS , CREATININEMAU , VUNGCANKHAOSAT , BHYTDONGTIEN , THUTIENSAU , DVKEMTHEO , DVKEMTHEO_KHACEKIP , LIENCHUYENKHOA ) values ( #ID# , #TIEPNHAN_ID# , #BENHAN_ID# , #KHAMBENH_ID# , #SODICHVUYEUCAU# , #KHAMBENH_NGOAITRU_ID# , vrSoPhieuYeu , #BENHNHAN_ID# , #DOITUONG_ID# , #DICHVU_ID#
#NGUOICHIDINH_ID#
, #BACSICHIDINH_ID# , #GIOYEUCAU# , #NGAYYEUCAU# , #THANGYEUCAU# , #NAMYEUCAU# , #NGAYGIOYEUCAU# , #THUTUYEUCAU# , #NOIYEUCAU_ID# , #NOITHUCHIEN_ID# , #TRANGTHAI_HANGDOI# , #NOIDUNGCHITIET# , #CHANDOAN# , #LUUTRU_ID# , #SODICHVUDONGTIEN# , #DICHVU_KHAMBENH_ID# , #DALAYMAU# , #SINHTHIET# , #CLOTEST# , #TIEMCANQUANG# , #TRIEUCHUNG# , #DAITHE# , #VITHE# , #BENHPHAM# , #DANHANBENHPHAM# , #NGAYNHANBENHPHAM# , #THOIGIANNHANBENHPHAM# , #NGUOINHANBENHPHAM_ID# , #MANGUOINHAPBENHPHAM# , #TENNGUOINHAPBENHPHAM# , #KETQUAXNKHAC# , #YEUCAUBENNGOAI# , #THUCHIENBENNGOAI# , #DONVIBENNGOAI_ID# , #BACSIBENNGOAI_ID# , #TENBACSIBENNGOAI# , #KHOABENNGOAI_ID# , #KHOABENNGOAI#
#NGUOIGIOITHIEU_ID#
#DONVIGIOITHIEU_ID#
#NGUONDICHVU_ID#
, #NOITHUCHIENTHAYDOI_ID# , #LOAIKHACHHANG_ID# , #THE_ID# , #BARCODEID# , #HOPDONG_ID# , #HOPDONG_BENHNHAN_ID# , #HINHTHUCTHANHTOAN_ID# , #DANGKY_ID# , #DANGKY_CHITIET_ID# , #LICHHEN_ID# , #THOIGIANLICHHEN# , #BNKHONGDENBV# , #GHICHU# , #THANHTOANTRUOC# , #KHAN# , #DUOCPHEPTHUCHIEN# , #HUYYEUCAU# , #LYDOHUY# , #TRANGTHAI# , #KHOADULIEU# , #NGAYKHOADULIEU# , #THOIGIANKHOADULIEU# , #NGUOIKHOA_ID# , #MANGUOIKHOA# , #TENNGUOIKHOA# , #BENHVIEN_ID# , #NGAYTAO# , #NGUOITAO_ID# , #NGAYHENCLS# , #CREATININEMAU# , #VUNGCANKHAOSAT# , #BHYTDONGTIEN# , #THUTIENSAU# , #DVKEMTHEO# , #DVKEMTHEO_KHACEKIP# , #LIENCHUYENKHOA# ); END;
statements.statement: select * from TT_DVYEUCAU where DVYEUCAU_ID = '$DVYEUCAU_ID$'
statements.update: update TT_DVYEUCAU set MARIS = #MARIS# , NGUOICAPNHAT_ID = #NGUOICAPNHAT_ID# , NGAYCAPNHAT = #NGAYCAPNHAT# where DVYEUCAU_ID = '$DVYEUCAU_ID$'
statements.statement: select DVYEUCAU_ID from TT_DVYEUCAU where MARIS = '$MARIS$' and BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$' and DVYEUCAU_ID != '$DVYEUCAU_ID$' and HUYYEUCAU != 1
statements.update:
update TT_DVYEUCAU set TIEPNHAN_ID = #TIEPNHAN_ID# , BENHAN_ID = #BENHAN_ID# , KHAMBENH_ID = #KHAMBENH_ID# , SOPHIEUYEUCAU = #SOPHIEUYEUCAU#
, BENHNHAN_ID = #BENHNHAN_ID# , DOITUONG_ID = #DOITUONG_ID# , DICHVU_ID = #DICHVU_ID# , BACSICHIDINH_ID = #BACSICHIDINH_ID#
NGUOICHIDINH_ID = #NGUOICHIDINH_ID#
, GIOYEUCAU = #GIOYEUCAU# , NGAYYEUCAU = #NGAYYEUCAU# , THANGYEUCAU = #THANGYEUCAU# , NAMYEUCAU = #NAMYEUCAU# , NGAYGIOYEUCAU = #NGAYGIOYEUCAU# , THUTUYEUCAU = #THUTUYEUCAU# , NOIYEUCAU_ID = #NOIYEUCAU_ID# , NOITHUCHIEN_ID = #NOITHUCHIEN_ID# , TRANGTHAI_HANGDOI = #TRANGTHAI_HANGDOI# , NOIDUNGCHITIET = #NOIDUNGCHITIET# , CHANDOAN = #CHANDOAN# , LUUTRU_ID = #LUUTRU_ID# , SODICHVUDONGTIEN = #SODICHVUDONGTIEN# , DICHVU_KHAMBENH_ID = #DICHVU_KHAMBENH_ID# , DALAYMAU = #DALAYMAU# , SINHTHIET = #SINHTHIET# , CLOTEST = #CLOTEST# , TIEMCANQUANG = #TIEMCANQUANG# , TRIEUCHUNG = #TRIEUCHUNG# , DAITHE = #DAITHE# , VITHE = #VITHE# , BENHPHAM = #BENHPHAM# , DANHANBENHPHAM = #DANHANBENHPHAM# , NGAYNHANBENHPHAM = #NGAYNHANBENHPHAM# , THOIGIANNHANBENHPHAM = #THOIGIANNHANBENHPHAM# , NGUOINHANBENHPHAM_ID = #NGUOINHANBENHPHAM_ID# , MANGUOINHAPBENHPHAM = #MANGUOINHAPBENHPHAM# , TENNGUOINHAPBENHPHAM = #TENNGUOINHAPBENHPHAM# , KETQUAXNKHAC = #KETQUAXNKHAC# , YEUCAUBENNGOAI = #YEUCAUBENNGOAI# , THUCHIENBENNGOAI = #THUCHIENBENNGOAI# , DONVIBENNGOAI_ID = #DONVIBENNGOAI_ID# , BACSIBENNGOAI_ID = #BACSIBENNGOAI_ID# , TENBACSIBENNGOAI = #TENBACSIBENNGOAI# , KHOABENNGOAI_ID = #KHOABENNGOAI_ID# , KHOABENNGOAI = #KHOABENNGOAI#
NGUOIGIOITHIEU_ID = #NGUOIGIOITHIEU_ID#
DONVIGIOITHIEU_ID = #DONVIGIOITHIEU_ID#
NGUONDICHVU_ID = #NGUONDICHVU_ID#
, NOITHUCHIENTHAYDOI_ID = #NOITHUCHIENTHAYDOI_ID# , LOAIKHACHHANG_ID = #LOAIKHACHHANG_ID# , THE_ID = #THE_ID# , BARCODEID = #BARCODEID# , HOPDONG_ID = #HOPDONG_ID# , HOPDONG_BENHNHAN_ID = #HOPDONG_BENHNHAN_ID# , HINHTHUCTHANHTOAN_ID = #HINHTHUCTHANHTOAN_ID#
, LICHHEN_ID = #LICHHEN_ID# , THOIGIANLICHHEN = #THOIGIANLICHHEN# , BNKHONGDENBV = #BNKHONGDENBV# , GHICHU = #GHICHU# , THANHTOANTRUOC = #THANHTOANTRUOC# , KHAN = #KHAN# , DUOCPHEPTHUCHIEN = #DUOCPHEPTHUCHIEN# , HUYYEUCAU = #HUYYEUCAU# , LYDOHUY = #LYDOHUY# , TRANGTHAI = #TRANGTHAI# , KHOADULIEU = #KHOADULIEU# , NGAYKHOADULIEU = #NGAYKHOADULIEU# , THOIGIANKHOADULIEU = #THOIGIANKHOADULIEU# , NGUOIKHOA_ID = #NGUOIKHOA_ID# , MANGUOIKHOA = #MANGUOIKHOA# , TENNGUOIKHOA = #TENNGUOIKHOA# , BENHVIEN_ID = #BENHVIEN_ID# , NGAYCAPNHAT = #NGAYCAPNHAT# , NGUOICAPNHAT_ID = #NGUOICAPNHAT_ID# , NGAYHENCLS = #NGAYHENCLS# , CREATININEMAU = #CREATININEMAU# , VUNGCANKHAOSAT = #VUNGCANKHAOSAT# , BHYTDONGTIEN = #BHYTDONGTIEN# , THUTIENSAU = #THUTIENSAU# , DVKEMTHEO = #DVKEMTHEO# , DVKEMTHEO_KHACEKIP = #DVKEMTHEO_KHACEKIP# , LIENCHUYENKHOA = #LIENCHUYENKHOA# where DVYEUCAU_ID = '$DVYEUCAU_ID$'

update TT_DVYEUCAU set TRANGTHAI = #TRANGTHAI# , NGAYCAPNHAT = #NGAYCAPNHAT# , NGUOICAPNHAT_ID = #NGUOICAPNHAT_ID# , KHOADULIEU = #KHOADULIEU# , NGAYKHOADULIEU = #NGAYKHOADULIEU# , THOIGIANKHOADULIEU = #THOIGIANKHOADULIEU# , NGUOIKHOA_ID = #NGUOIKHOA_ID# , MANGUOIKHOA = #MANGUOIKHOA# , TENNGUOIKHOA = #TENNGUOIKHOA# where DVYEUCAU_ID = #DVYEUCAU_ID#
update TT_BENHNHAN set TIENSUDIUNG = #TIENSUDIUNG# , TIENSUBENH = #TIENSUBENH# , NGUOICAPNHAT_ID = #NGUOICAPNHAT_ID# , NGAYCAPNHAT = #NGAYCAPNHAT# where BENHNHAN_ID = #BENHNHAN_ID#
statements.statement:
delete from TT_DVYEUCAU
TT_DVYEUCAU.DVYEUCAU_ID = '$DVYEUCAU_ID$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.TIEPNHAN_ID = '$TIEPNHAN_ID$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.BENHAN_ID = '$BENHAN_ID$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.KHAMBENH_ID = '$KHAMBENH_ID$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.SODICHVUYEUCAU = '$SODICHVUYEUCAU$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.SOPHIEUYEUCAU = '$SOPHIEUYEUCAU$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.BENHNHAN_ID = '$BENHNHAN_ID$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.DOITUONG_ID = '$DOITUONG_ID$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.DICHVU_ID = '$DICHVU_ID$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.BACSICHIDINH_ID = '$BACSICHIDINH_ID$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.GIOYEUCAU = '$GIOYEUCAU$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.NGAYYEUCAU = '$NGAYYEUCAU$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.THANGYEUCAU = '$THANGYEUCAU$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.NAMYEUCAU = '$NAMYEUCAU$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.NGAYGIOYEUCAU = '$NGAYGIOYEUCAU$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.THUTUYEUCAU = '$THUTUYEUCAU$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.NOIYEUCAU_ID = '$NOIYEUCAU_ID$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.NOITHUCHIEN_ID = '$NOITHUCHIEN_ID$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.TRANGTHAI_HANGDOI = '$TRANGTHAI_HANGDOI$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.NOIDUNGCHITIET = '$NOIDUNGCHITIET$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.CHANDOAN = '$CHANDOAN$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.LUUTRU_ID = '$LUUTRU_ID$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.SODICHVUDONGTIEN = '$SODICHVUDONGTIEN$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.DICHVU_KHAMBENH_ID = '$DICHVU_KHAMBENH_ID$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.DALAYMAU = '$DALAYMAU$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.SINHTHIET = '$SINHTHIET$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.CLOTEST = '$CLOTEST$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.TIEMCANQUANG = '$TIEMCANQUANG$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.TRIEUCHUNG = '$TRIEUCHUNG$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.DAITHE = '$DAITHE$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.VITHE = '$VITHE$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.BENHPHAM = '$BENHPHAM$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.DANHANBENHPHAM = '$DANHANBENHPHAM$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.NGAYNHANBENHPHAM = '$NGAYNHANBENHPHAM$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.THOIGIANNHANBENHPHAM = '$THOIGIANNHANBENHPHAM$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.NGUOINHANBENHPHAM_ID = '$NGUOINHANBENHPHAM_ID$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.MANGUOINHAPBENHPHAM = '$MANGUOINHAPBENHPHAM$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.TENNGUOINHAPBENHPHAM = '$TENNGUOINHAPBENHPHAM$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.KETQUAXNKHAC = '$KETQUAXNKHAC$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.YEUCAUBENNGOAI = '$YEUCAUBENNGOAI$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.THUCHIENBENNGOAI = '$THUCHIENBENNGOAI$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.DONVIBENNGOAI_ID = '$DONVIBENNGOAI_ID$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.BACSIBENNGOAI_ID = '$BACSIBENNGOAI_ID$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.TENBACSIBENNGOAI = '$TENBACSIBENNGOAI$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.KHOABENNGOAI_ID = '$KHOABENNGOAI_ID$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.KHOABENNGOAI = '$KHOABENNGOAI$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.NOITHUCHIENTHAYDOI_ID = '$NOITHUCHIENTHAYDOI_ID$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.LOAIKHACHHANG_ID = '$LOAIKHACHHANG_ID$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.THE_ID = '$THE_ID$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.BARCODEID = '$BARCODEID$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.HOPDONG_ID = '$HOPDONG_ID$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.HOPDONG_BENHNHAN_ID = '$HOPDONG_BENHNHAN_ID$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.HINHTHUCTHANHTOAN_ID = '$HINHTHUCTHANHTOAN_ID$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.DANGKY_ID = '$DANGKY_ID$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.DANGKY_CHITIET_ID = '$DANGKY_CHITIET_ID$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.LICHHEN_ID = '$LICHHEN_ID$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.THOIGIANLICHHEN = '$THOIGIANLICHHEN$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.BNKHONGDENBV = '$BNKHONGDENBV$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.GHICHU = '$GHICHU$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.THANHTOANTRUOC = '$THANHTOANTRUOC$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.KHAN = '$KHAN$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.DUOCPHEPTHUCHIEN = '$DUOCPHEPTHUCHIEN$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.HUYYEUCAU = '$HUYYEUCAU$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.LYDOHUY = '$LYDOHUY$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.TRANGTHAI = '$TRANGTHAI$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.KHOADULIEU = '$KHOADULIEU$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.NGAYKHOADULIEU = '$NGAYKHOADULIEU$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.THOIGIANKHOADULIEU = '$THOIGIANKHOADULIEU$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.NGUOIKHOA_ID = '$NGUOIKHOA_ID$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.MANGUOIKHOA = '$MANGUOIKHOA$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.TENNGUOIKHOA = '$TENNGUOIKHOA$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.NGAYTAO = '$NGAYTAO$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.NGUOITAO_ID = '$NGUOITAO_ID$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.NGAYCAPNHAT = '$NGAYCAPNHAT$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.NGUOICAPNHAT_ID = '$NGUOICAPNHAT_ID$'
select * from TT_DVYEUCAU where KhAMBENH_ID = '$KHAMBENH_ID$'
select DVYEUCAU_ID, DICHVU_ID from TT_DVYEUCAU where TIEPNHAN_ID = '$TIEPNHAN_ID$'
select * from TT_TIEPNHAN where TIEPNHAN_ID = '$TIEPNHAN_ID$'

select * from TT_DVYEUCAU_THAYDOI where DVYEUCAU_ID in (select DVYEUCAU_ID from TT_DVYEUCAU
TT_DVYEUCAU.DVYEUCAU_ID = '$DVYEUCAU_ID$'
TT_DVYEUCAU.TIEPNHAN_ID = '$TIEPNHAN_ID$'
)
statements.insert:
select TT_DVYEUCAU_THAYDOI_S.nextval as value from dual
insert into TT_DVYEUCAU_THAYDOI ( DVYEUCAU_THAYDOI_ID , DVYEUCAU_ID , PHONGBAN_ID , PHONGBAN_THAYDOI_ID , LANTHAYDOI , NGAYTHAYDOI , THOIGIANTHAYDOI , NGUOITHAYDOI_ID , BENHVIEN_ID , NGAYTAO , NGUOITAO_ID ) values ( #DVYEUCAU_THAYDOI_ID# , #DVYEUCAU_ID# , #PHONGBAN_ID# , #PHONGBAN_THAYDOI_ID# , #LANTHAYDOI# , #NGAYTHAYDOI# , #THOIGIANTHAYDOI# , #NGUOITHAYDOI_ID# , #BENHVIEN_ID# , #NGAYTAO# , #NGUOITAO_ID# )
statements.update: update TT_DVYEUCAU set NOITHUCHIEN_ID = #NOITHUCHIEN_ID# where DVYEUCAU_ID = #DVYEUCAU_ID#
statements.statement:
select * from TT_DVYEUCAU where (DALAYMAU is null or DALAYMAU = 0) and HUYYEUCAU != '1' and TIEPNHAN_ID = '$TIEPNHAN_ID$' and BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$' and DICHVU_ID in
#LSTDVXETNGHIEM_ID[]#

select * from TT_DVYEUCAU TT where not exists (select TC.DVYEUCAU_ID from TT_CLSKETQUACHITIET TC where TC.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$' and TC.DVYEUCAU_ID = TT.DVYEUCAU_ID) and TT.TIEPNHAN_ID = '$TIEPNHAN_ID$' and TT.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'
TT.DALAYMAU = '$DALAYMAU$'
and TT.DICHVU_ID in
#LSTDVXETNGHIEM_ID[]#
select * from LST_KEYDATA where KEYTYPE = '$KEYTYPE$' and KEYYEAR = '$KEYYEAR$' and KEYMONTH = '$KEYMONTH$' and KEYDAY = '$KEYDAY$' and SEGMENT_1 = '$SEGMENT_1$' and KEYVALUE >= '$KEYVALUE$'
statements.update: update LST_KEYDATA set KEYVALUE = '$KEYVALUE$' where KEYTYPE = '$KEYTYPE$' and KEYYEAR = '$KEYYEAR$' and KEYMONTH = '$KEYMONTH$' and KEYDAY = '$KEYDAY$' and SEGMENT_1 = '$SEGMENT_1$'
statements.statement:
select ba.SOBENHAN, NVL(clskq.NGAYGIOTHUCHIEN, pt.THOIGIANBATDAU) as THOIGIANTHUCHIEN, clskq.BACSITHUCHIEN_ID, tn.SOTIEPNHAN, dv.*, vp.SOLUONG from TT_DVYEUCAU dv left join TT_NOITRU_BENHAN ba on dv.BENHAN_ID = ba.BENHAN_ID left join TT_CLSKETQUA clskq on (clskq.CLSKETQUA_ID in (select CLSKETQUA_ID from TT_CLSKETQUACHITIET where DVYEUCAU_ID = dv.DVYEUCAU_ID) or clskq.DVYEUCAU_ID = dv.DVYEUCAU_ID) left join TT_NGOAITRU_KHAMBENH kb on dv.KHAMBENH_NGOAITRU_ID = kb.KHAMBENH_ID left join TT_PHAUTHUAT pt on pt.PHAUTHUAT_ID in (select PHAUTHUAT_ID from TT_PHAUTHUAT_YEUCAU where DVYEUCAU_ID = dv.DVYEUCAU_ID) left join TT_TIEPNHAN tn on dv.TIEPNHAN_ID = tn.TIEPNHAN_ID left join TT_VIENPHI vp on vp.REF_ID = dv.DVYEUCAU_ID and REF_TABLE = 'TT_DVYEUCAU' where tn.BENHNHAN_ID = '$BENHNHAN_ID$' and dv.BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'
trunc(NGAYGIOYEUCAU) BETWEEN trunc(#TUNGAY#) and trunc(#DENNGAY#)
dv.BACSICHIDINH_ID = '$BACSICHIDINH_ID$'
dv.NOIYEUCAU_ID = '$NOIYEUCAU_ID$'
order by dv.DVYEUCAU_ID desc
select * from TT_DVYEUCAU where DVYEUCAU_ID = '$DVYEUCAU_ID$'
select * from TT_DVYEUCAU where DVYEUCAU_ID in ($DS_DVYEUCAU$) and (TRANGTHAI != 'CHUAKETQUA')
select TIEPNHAN_ID from TT_DVYEUCAU where TIEPNHAN_ID IN ( $TIEPNHAN_LIST$ ) AND BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$'
select TIEPNHAN_ID, VIENPHI_ID, REF_ID, DICHVU_ID from TT_VIENPHI where TIEPNHAN_ID IN ( $TIEPNHAN_LIST$ ) AND BENHVIEN_ID = '$BENHVIEN_ID$' AND DATHANHTOAN = '0'
